title: His Calling
description: As a police officer, Debbie seeks justice against criminals. After capturing a thief and helping him turn to Jesus she receives the calling. As a reporter, Elizabeth seeks the truth in what she does. When she is fired by her boss for refusing his advances she receives the calling. As a nurse, Anna seeks mercy to all her patients. After saving the life of a gang member she receives the calling. God has called upon all three of them to be his angels on earth. Guided by a strange junk food addict, the three women seek out to find and save a man that the world has forgotten . . . but God hasn't.
author: Jason J. Cross
